home.name: Rodrigo Cardoso
home.subtitle: Full-stack Developer
home.description: Hello, I'm Rodrigo Cardoso, a passionate and experienced full-stack developer with a focus on Java and Angular. I have a strong background in building web applications using Spring Boot. With a keen eye for detail and a love for problem-solving, I strive to create intuitive, efficient, and user-friendly web experiences. My expertise lies in developing robust and scalable solutions, leveraging my extensive knowledge of front-end technologies and back-end frameworks. I am dedicated to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends, ensuring that I always deliver cutting-edge solutions. If you're looking for a skilled developer who can bring your web application ideas to life, feel free to get in touch!
